titleStmt.title: The History of the whiggish-plot, or, A brief historical account of the charge and deefnce [sic] of [brace] William Lord Russel, Capt. Tho. Walcot, John Rouse, William Hone, Captain Blague, [brace] Algernoon Sidney, Esq., Sir Sam. Barnardiston, John Hambden, Esq., Lawrence Braddon, Hugh Speak, Esq. together with an account of the proceedings upon the outlawry against James Holloway, and Sir Thomas Armstrong : not omitting any one material passage in the whole proceeding : humbly dedicated to His Royal Highness.
titleStmt.author: Turner, John, b. 1649 or 50.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.B. and are to be sold by Randal Taylor ...,

notesStmt.note: This work appears at reel 1105:34 as Wing T3309 (number cancelled in Wing 2nd ed.) and as Wing H2190B at reel 1702:16.
Reproduction of originals in the Harvard University Library and the Huntington Library.
